name: Dodge Me !
description:
Help Your funny and little character to prevent from dangerous blocks and help for food to collect points.

- Dodge your character and save from blocks.
- Eat food for points.
- Funny ragdoll Character.
- Different types of colorful & cartoonist blocks and food.
- vivid and colorful graphics.
- Cool game environment.

Dodge and eat !!

Available On Google Play Store : Dodge Me ! - Apps on Google Play
